Typealiases.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX12.name: MappingValue
Typealiases.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX12.abstract: Ordered map of type or class to (scheme, script) tuple.

Typealiases.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX9L.name: Literated
Typealiases.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX9L.abstract: Transliterated output of any function that changes input.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: count
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: The number of key-value pairs in the dictionary.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: keys
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: List containing keys of the dictionary in increasing order of recency.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: updateValue(_:forKey:)
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Updates the value stored in the dictionary for the given key, or adds a new key-value pair if the key does not exist.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: init(_:)
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Initialize the data-structure from the list of tuples. Later keys in the list override older keys.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: removeValue(forKey:)
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Removes the given key and its associated value from the dictionary.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: subscript(_:default:)
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Get or set the value of the given key. defaultValue is not evaluated unless needed.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Get or set the value of the given key.

Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.name: removeAll()
Structs/OrderedMap.html#/s:16LipikaEngin.abstract: Removes all key-value pairs from the dictionary.

Structs/OrderedMap.html.name: OrderedMap
Structs/OrderedMap.html.abstract: Dictionary with ordered enumeration of keys. Keys are sorted by increasing recency of creation/mutation.

Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.name: debug
Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.abstract: Lots of informative messages only useful for developers while debugging

Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.name: warning
Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.abstract: Some unexpected execution paths that may be useful for power-users

Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.name: error
Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.abstract: Only those errors that are real and cause visible issues to the end-users

Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.name: fatal
Enums/Level.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OSX5L.abstract: Completely unexpected events that are usually indicative of fundamental bugs

Enums/LoggerError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.name: alreadyCapturing
Enums/LoggerError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.abstract: Indicates that startCapture was invoked again without calling endCapture in between.

Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.name: ioError(_:)
Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.abstract: Usually indicates that internal files on disk were not accessible as expected.

Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.name: parseError(_:)
Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.abstract: Class of issues that arises when contents of internal files are corrupted.

Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.name: invalidSelection(_:)
Enums/EngineError.html#/s:16LipikaEngine.abstract: Class of errors arising from invalid configuration or input parameter.

Enums/EngineError.html.name: EngineError
Enums/EngineError.html.abstract: Enumeration of errors that can be thrown by LiteratorFactory, Transliterator and Anteliterator.

Enums/Level.html.name: Level
Enums/Level.html.abstract: Enumeration of logging levels in the decreasing order of verbosity and increasing order of importance: debug, warning, error, fatal.

Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.name: isEmpty()
Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the Transliterator state is empty.

Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.name: findPosition(forPosition:inOutput:)
Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.abstract: For the given input or output position in the aggregate state of the Transliterator, return the corrosponding output or input position.

Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.name: transliterate(_:position:)
Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.abstract: Transliterate the aggregate input in the specified scheme to the corresponding unicode string in the specified target script.

Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.name: delete(position:)
Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.abstract: Delete the specified input character from the buffer if it exists or if unspecified, delete the last input character.

Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.name: reset()
Classes/Transliterator.html#/s:16LipikaE.abstract: Clears all transient internal state associated with previous inputs.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: log
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Thread-local singleton instance of Logger that clients must use. Logger itself cannot be instantiated.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: logLevel
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Get or set the level at and after which logs will be recorded.

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: debug(_:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Log the given message at debug level of importance

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: warning(_:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Log the given message at warning level of importance

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: error(_:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Log the given message at error level of importance

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: fatal(_:)
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Log the given message at fatal level of importance

Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: startCapture()
Classes/Logger.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Start capturing all messages that is also going to be logged.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: init(config:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Initialize with an implementation of the Config protocol.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: availableSchemes()
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Available schemes in the scheme directory provided by the custom implementation of Config that was used to initialize this factory class.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: availableScripts()
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Available scripts in the scheme directory provided by the given implementation of Config that was used to initialize this factory class.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: availableCustomMappings()
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Available custom mappings in the directory provided by the given implementation of Config that was used to initialize this factory class.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: mappings(schemeName:scriptName:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Get the underlying mappings for the specified scheme and script.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: transliterator(schemeName:scriptName:mappings:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Get an instance of Transliterator for the specified scheme and script.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: anteliterator(schemeName:scriptName:mappings:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Get an instance of Anteliterator for the specified scheme and script.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: transliterator(customMapping:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Get an instance of Transliterator for the specified customMapping.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.name: anteliterator(customMapping:)
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html#/s:16Lipik.abstract: Get an instance of Anteliterator for the specified customMapping.

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: init()
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: Empty public init to enable clients to call super.init()

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: stopCharacter
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: This character is used to break input aggregation. Typically this is the forward-slash character (\).

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: escapeCharacter
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: All input characters enclosed by this character will be echoed to the output as-is and not converted.

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: mappingDirectory
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: The URL path to the top-level directory where the schemes files are present. Usually this would return something like Bundle.main.bundleURL.appendingPathComponent("Mapping")

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: customMappingDirectory
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: The URL path to the top-level directory where custom mapping files in SCM format are present. Usually this would return something like Bundle.main.bundleURL.appendingPathComponent("Custom")

Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.name: logLevel
Classes/Config.html#/s:16LipikaEngine_OS.abstract: The level at which to NSLog log messages generated by LipikaEngine.

Classes/Anteliterator.html#/s:16LipikaEn.name: anteliterate(_:)
Classes/Anteliterator.html#/s:16LipikaEn.abstract: Reverse transliterates unicode string in the specified target script into the corresponding input String in the specified scheme.

Classes/Anteliterator.html.name: Anteliterator
Classes/Anteliterator.html.abstract: Stateless class that provides the ability to reverse-transliterate from the given script to the specified scheme with the anteliterate API. Unlike the Transliterator, this class does not aggregate inputs. The assumption is that while anteliterating the clients already have the full output string that they want to reverse-transliterate into the specified scheme.

Classes/Config.html.name: Config
Classes/Config.html.abstract: This class provides default config values that the client can override, typically using UserDefaults and pass an instance into LiteratorFactory.

Classes/LiteratorFactory.html.name: LiteratorFactory
Classes/LiteratorFactory.html.abstract: Use this class to get an instance of Transliterator and Anteliterator. This class is responsible for the two step initialization that is needed to generate an instance of Transliterator or Anteliterator.

Classes/Logger.html.name: Logger
Classes/Logger.html.abstract: If clients want to use the same log formatting and logger features of LipikaEngine, they are free to use this class.

Classes/Transliterator.html.name: Transliterator
Classes/Transliterator.html.abstract: Stateful class that aggregates incremental input in the given scheme and provides aggregated output in the specified script through the transliterate API.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
